text.tspan: The rise and fall of the share of employment in industry, 1870 to
Unit 16 'Technological progress, employment, and living standards in the long run’ Section 16.11 'Slower productivity growth
in services, and the changing nature of work' in The CORE Team, The Economy. Available at: https://tinyco.re/16111880
